comments: Benford's law suggests that this sequence will contain about (log 5 - log 4)/log 10 =~ 10% of factorials. [From _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 13 2010]The next term (a(6)) has 106 digits. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 05 2015
author: _Jeff Burch_
extensions: One more term (a(5)) from _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 05 2015
